sentences.en: "That's too bad," Teddy said without rancour.
sentences.cn: “那太糟糕了！”特迪并无怨怒地说道。

sentences.en: A good man terminates a friendship with out rancour.
And so much rancour remained on the spirits of the gracious Duncan upon this occasion.
sentences.cn: 对这件事,豁达的邓肯一直怀恨在心.

sentences.en: By the side of Victor Emmanuel every quarrel should be forgotten, all rancour depart.
sentences.cn: 在维多·伊曼纽尔身旁,一切争执都应当忘记, 一切宿恨都应该抛弃.

sentences.en: By the side of Victor Emmanuel every quarrel should be forgotten, all rancour departed.
sentences.cn: 在维多?伊曼纽尔身旁,一切争执都应当忘记, 一切宿恨都应该抛弃.

sentences.en: Despite rumours of rancour at distributions , Caritas distributions so far have been calm and respectful.
sentences.cn: 虽然外界对救济品的分发议论纷纷,明爱会的分发至今尚称平静又受尊敬.

sentences.en: She learned to accept criticism without rancour .
sentences.cn: 她学会了坦然接受批评而不怀恨在心。

sentences.en: Yet that business now looks in danger of unravelling in an atmosphere of rancour.
sentences.cn: 不过,该业务目前似乎有可能在敌意气氛中解体.

trans.tran_en: a feeling of hatred and anger towards someone you cannot forgive because they harmed you in the past
